member.name: T:FHDW.Hotel.Repository.AdminRepository
member.summary: Every Request returning an Admin-Object will be handled in this Repository.

member.name: M:FHDW.Hotel.Repository.AdminRepository.GetByUsername(System.String)
member.summary: Request an Admin-Object from the Database, with the username.
member.returns: The found Adminobject will be returned. If no Admin was found, NULL will be returned.

member.name: T:FHDW.Hotel.Repository.GuestRepository
member.summary: Every Request returning a Guest-Object will be handled in this Repository.

member.name: M:FHDW.Hotel.Repository.GuestRepository.GetByEmail(System.String)
member.summary: Get a specific Guest by their Emailaddress.
member.returns: The requested Guest. If no Guest exists, return NULL.

member.name: M:FHDW.Hotel.Repository.GuestRepository.Insert(FHDW.Hotel.DomainModel.Guest)
member.summary: Insert a new Guest into the database.
member.returns: The Newly created Guest. NULL, or Exception if an error occurs.

member.name: M:FHDW.Hotel.Repository.GuestRepository.Update(FHDW.Hotel.DomainModel.Guest)
member.summary: Update an existing Guest in the databse.
member.returns: The updated Guest-Object. NULL, or Exception if an error occurs.

member.name: T:FHDW.Hotel.Repository.HotelRepository
member.summary: Every Request returning a Hotel-Object will be handled in this Repository.

member.name: M:FHDW.Hotel.Repository.HotelRepository.GetCollection
member.summary: Get a List of all Hotels in the database.
member.returns: List with all Hotels. If no Hotel exists, return an empty List.

member.name: M:FHDW.Hotel.Repository.HotelRepository.GetById(System.Int32)
member.returns: The requested Hotel. If no Hotel exists, return NULL.

member.name: T:FHDW.Hotel.Repository.RoomRepository
member.summary: Every Request returning a Room-Object will be handled in this Repository.

member.name: M:FHDW.Hotel.Repository.RoomRepository.GetById(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get a specific Room by ID.
member.returns: The requested Hotel. If no Hotel exists, return NULL.

member.name: M:FHDW.Hotel.Repository.RoomRepository.GetAvailableRooms(System.Int32,System.DateTime,System.DateTime)
member.summary: Get a List of all Rooms, wich are not already booked in a specific timeframe.
member.returns: List with all Rooms. If no Room exists, return an empty List.

member.name: M:FHDW.Hotel.Repository.RoomRepository.Insert(FHDW.Hotel.DomainModel.Room)
member.summary: Insert a new Room into the databse.
member.returns: The Newly created Room-Object. NULL, or Exception if an error occurs.

member.name: M:FHDW.Hotel.Repository.RoomRepository.Update(FHDW.Hotel.DomainModel.Room)
member.summary: Update an existing Room in the Database.
member.returns: The updated Room-Object. NULL, or Exception if an error occurs.

member.name: M:FHDW.Hotel.Repository.RoomRepository.Delete(FHDW.Hotel.DomainModel.Room)
member.returns: The deleted Room-Object. NULL, or Exception if an error occurs.
